question: Which data scientists have interacted with articles related to cloud computing on their LinkedIn profiles from companies known for progressive tech stacks?

subtasks.task: Identify companies known for their progressive tech stacks. [CompanyTechStack]
Gather LinkedIn activity data for data scientists from these companies. [PersonaLinkedinActivity, PersonaUser]
Filter the LinkedIn activity to find interactions with cloud computing articles. [PersonaLinkedinActivity]
Compile a list of data scientists who interacted with the relevant articles. [PersonaLinkedinActivity, PersonaUser]
